website_summaries.verdict: A well-built fireplace grate with ample bars and solid construction designed for daily use.
pros: Can be used in either an outdoor or indoor fireplace
Good height and width to fill a fireplace
cons: The dimensions on the wood holder are only 20", but the legs are 24" wide

customer_reviews.title: Starting to sag within a week!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was prompt and packaging was great. Threw out the old grate and this large size fit our fireplace perfectly. Seemed like a well made grate and expected a long useful life, but within a week of having a fire, a noticeable sag occurred. Maybe this larger size grate requires some middle support. "The four strong legs help to prevent sagging due to heat and the weight of the firewood." is their claim but evidently this isn't enough. Pretty disappointing to have a product fail this quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy for hot Oak and cedar fires
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy for hot Oak and cedar fires! Has plenty of height to allow foe the building of a nice bed of coals to keep those oak logs burning perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Don P.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very heavy duty product
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was kind of pricey when I saw it, but after I received it I changed my mind. This is made from thick heavy steel. I have had other log grates where the metal was half the size and would always melt and bend. This looks like it will stand up to the heat. The only problem I had was that the front legs were a little too wide. The description showed it to be 21 inches, which would be fine, but the one I received was about 22 1/2 inches. I have torch so I was able to adjust it to fit. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Built to last.
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy weight, well built fireplace grate. It is designed to keep the logs from falling backwards, when you adjust the logs. Cheaper ones out there- glad I went with quality to last.
customer_reviews.author: Order66

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW - WOW - WOW. This is 100% better than what I had. Very sturdy and fits perfectly in my fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Zardoz

customer_reviews.title: PAYING FOR REVIEWS!?!
customer_reviews.text: The product seems fine. Offering 10% off for a five star review is just shady. The quality should stand on its own - paying for reviews is just wrong. I’ll buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Whatserbucket

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Is not Wrought Iron. Its cold roll steel. We use our fireplace all winter long, his thing started losing shape after the first day. By the end of the week the middle had sagged down and was laying on the bottom of the fireplace. I had to find a piece of steel to prop up the center and get it hot again so it would straighten back out. Don't wast your money. Spend the extra cash and get a good real Wrought Iron grate.
customer_reviews.author: dmnviper

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as described.
customer_reviews.text: The vendor made a big deal in the Amazon ad that this was made of 3/4 inch stock. Well that's true, but what the vendor did not explain is that it is a diamond shaped cross section, and in the orientation it is used, the bars are 3/4 wide and only 1/2 thick vertically. I would prefer to have the 3/4 vertically. Very little welding material was used to build this, the welds are literally just dabs. I've only been using it for 8 weeks now so it's to early to evaluate if the welding is sufficient. On the plus side, the price is fair for what it is, even if not perfectly described.
customer_reviews.author: Bucko!

customer_reviews.title: Too small to actually use
customer_reviews.text: Although the product is well built I dont know what you would use it for. Once I put a split piece of wood in the grate it sunk in how small this thing really was. I am sitting here now with two small chunks of wood burning and it has filled this grate to overflowing. Cant return it cause it is used and the paint is dripping off onto the bottom of our new fireplace. So now I am back to shopping for a grate that will fit and am out the $50 I paid for this one. Still, it will be worth it to have a grate I can use
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: The grate on the 30" model is only 25" at it's widest. The legs are splayed out to 30" but that's not what I took to mean by "30 inch grate". If the powder coating on yours is chipped as mine was, you'll see that it is steel, not wrought iron as advertised. I don't know the reason for powdercoating a fireplace grate, other than to make it look thicker and conceal what its made of. I am keeping it because it is adequate, however not as described.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Grate sags after 4 days of Fires
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking grate out of the box. Had a couple of chips in the paint but that didn't bother me. However, after 4 days of fires at 8-10 hrs a day the front cross member sagged at least 1 inch if not more and given this behavior it must be soft enough metal that it will continue to sag with more fires. Unacceptable!!
customer_reviews.author: bitbob

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fireplace grate, won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: By far the best grate we have ever bought. We have fires as soon as it starts to get chilly (60 degrees is chilly to me in Missouri) We bought this one in the fall of 2017 and it has lasted with no issues with melting or buckling, like the other brands we have had. First picture was March of this year and the second is November of 2018. The last picture is the grate that came with the fireplace when we built the house it didn’t even last 2 months with the fires we have.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, all the black coating burns off in the fire.
customer_reviews.text: The construction seems hefty, the grate weighs 30 lbs, but the black coating is not at all durable. I set it up on the day I received and got a fire going- smelled something weird and noticed bubbling on the black coating on grate. The black coating was burning and peeling off and was emitting some pretty noxious fumes. When I finally It all cooled off - coating turned white and just fell off- leaving exposed metal. I’m returning tomorrow. Don’t buy this -
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: How strudy and heavy it is...will last for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband as birthday gift..the old one was broke and used it a long time...worn it out! Never tried this one but read reviews and thought we would try it...got it yesterday, cleaned out fireplace and put it in and was happy to see that it fit so good. Like how heavy and strudy it is and the space between the floor of the fireplace and the wood you put on it. Will recomment it to anyone who reads this review. Haven't had long enough to rate durabilty. Shorty
customer_reviews.author: Shorty

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up to heat.
customer_reviews.text: I got this "heavy duty" fireplace grate and it was in my fireplace by Feb. 20. After a few weeks I was extremely pleased with how it was holding up to heat and weight of the logs, and the all of a sudden it began to dip in the middle in both the front and back. We had a cool spring to date {May 22) so I just stopped using the fireplace and the grate is a warped mess. Extremely disappointed. Does anyone make a grate that will withstand heat and a bit of weight when you use it in a large fireplace? Warped and disappointed in NJ.
customer_reviews.author: MFK

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This is my second grate. Last year I bought a smaller one. I was going to make do with my old grate in the fireplace I don't use very often. It didn't take long to get really spoiled with the small one so I got the larger one for my large fireplace. I love it. It stands high enough to get good air flow for the fire and with the larger size it accommodates bigger logs. Perfect for cold winter nights.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Crummy coating; very heavy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So this item is made of really heavy duty metal...but the coating is really crummy. Granted, the coating wont last the longest once its holding logs that are on fire...but thats not the point. This item wasnt very cheap and you can even see where the seller attempted to cover up a known missing piece of coating.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Howard

customer_reviews.title: Heavy weight Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy weight build. When I originally opened the shipping pkg., some of the black paint was already chipped off. My mother has used it in her fireplace a couple times so far. And, so far, so good. Personally, the most important aspect is that it lasts. Will have to try to remember to do an update next year, sometime 2021.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: finally able to enjoy a large fire in the fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews stating that this item did not hold up to heat. After using this new grate multiple times, my experience is much different from those reviews. This grate finally enabled us to have a large roaring fire in our fireplace. No issue with item not performing as expected. I would recommend this product to anyone looking to have a larger fire indoors. Temp 5' from the front of the fire was 110-120 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and it is an excellent product. Sure there might be a couple small chips on the bottom of the legs but who cares. It's going in the fireplace! Otherwise the overall quality and production of this is top notch. It's very heavy and feels like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Quality fireplace grate
customer_reviews.text: I have had to replace my fireplace grate several times over the past. My fireplace is for occasional use and not full time heating. The past grates seem to collapse in the middle where it is the hottest. I chose this grate because of its metal thickness and height. I needed it a little higher to fit over the gas pipe insert for igniting. I am very pleased with its look, thickness and height. Since it is new only time will tell if it lasts longer than the others. Right now I am very pleased with its overall quality and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GailW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised how well built this is and stands up to high heat in the fireplace so far. Very pleased with this item and it was cheaper here than at home depot or other local stores. That's what made me take a chance and it was definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: BryteVisuals

customer_reviews.title: Only Good for Decoration
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the other posts saying it's great. Maybe they aren't legit reviews. Vendor store will not return my emails. See the picture. It took about 3 fires for this to happen. It's no longer usable since now the sagging does not allow air to flow under the fire. Disappointing since it was rated for "daily use". I'm hoping getting away from Amazon and going with a more expensive grate will work.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: All tools work as expected. Very durable and easy to clean. Can you buy a more sturdy product? Sure. But you will end up paying almost twice as much. If you are looking for something that is rugged and works well with average size fireplace logs, these tools are the best for the price! Look no further. Delvery was prompt, assembly was a breeze, and the tools are going to last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing grate- large and of high quality. I have been burning fires on it almost daily and no signs of damage. I would highly recommend this! You can’t go wrong with this if you need a larger sized grate!
customer_reviews.author: SABINE

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: After less than a month of use, maybe 15 fires. The front started sagging until I couldn’t get my poker under the front.
customer_reviews.author: TtownTres

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: What else do I need to say? It does exactly what it is supposed to, holds wood that's on fire. If you have an issue with it I suggest you try to hold wood that is on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Myers

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality is good. However, we burn regular firewood in the fireplace and it turns out the bottom of the grate is not wide enough for the rough cuts you get with real wood. You can't fill it adequately to get a good fire going. Also, the upright tines are too short and we have even had some round pieces of wood fall out of the grate into the doors. (The house is tight and we always burn with the doors closed) Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: My existing fireplace grate finally gave out. Went to the home improvement stores and was unhappy with the quality level of a replacement and the cost. I saw this one on line and bought it. I was blown away by the sturdiness and quality of the construction. It was less than the cheap model at the home improvement box store. This one will last my lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: MALKY6:1

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty grate
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my fireplace and the correct size. Have had a dozen or so super hot fires using it this winter and it hasn't warped. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Fenley

customer_reviews.title: Built well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriends fireplace, hers had rotted away. Seems to be built well and is heavy, but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up to wood fires. Low quality.
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace log grate is low quality and started deforming within weeks. All other brands of grates lasted for several years. We will never purchase this product again and will discourage others from buying it. Unfortunately we missed returning it by one week so it’s a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Tom LeMenager

customer_reviews.title: Great product and an even better price.
customer_reviews.text: The only con for me was the height, because I have a small fit place the heat is closer to the flute so it takes longer to heat my living room. That’s my fault and not the products, I should have ensure I knew the height. Excellent product, heavy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Melo83

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality metal.
customer_reviews.text: The grate began to sag in the middle after a couple of fires. Obviously the metal is poor quality and can not stand the heat. Had to put a brick under the grate to support it. The grate might make it through this winter but we will need a replacement next year. Pretty expensive for just one season's use.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, high-quality material and apperance
customer_reviews.text: I would say I have a 'regular-sized' brick fireplace and this thing fit perfectly. I was debating the smaller one but glad I went with this size. It is robust and substantial looking in there and appears to be made of high quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: BikesAreFun

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: The past two years, our fireplace grate had actually 'drooped' down in the belly from the ash wood that I burn in my fireplace. Only had two fires thus far, but holding up perfectly. If anything changes over time, I'll be sure to come back to update.
customer_reviews.author: ortiesdad

customer_reviews.title: great size for our fireplace
customer_reviews.text: fireplace @ a cabin, so far so good!! I would like to see the front forks a little taller to hold logs inside the grate. That is just me thinking it would be better & more safe, although the large size, lengthwise makes it all good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: Crazy heavey duty .It should last a life time ! Best grate ever , safe and prefect size , and yes its heavey . Its made like your great grand dads was made . Very happy to see things are still built well again . I love old school quality.I hope it is made in the US
customer_reviews.author: M.F.B

customer_reviews.title: This a a quality product sure to last.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this grate. It is certainly sturdy, well made and attractive. It’s gone through about 10 fires so far and its durability is surely assured. It’s a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Joan P. Kennah

customer_reviews.title: well built
customer_reviews.text: Our son had purchased this grate and we right away wanted to order one as well! Very well built. you won't be sorry for this purchase
customer_reviews.author: 2020heaven

customer_reviews.title: not good for a regular sized logs
customer_reviews.text: Very small grate, not good for a regular sized logs. Note that the front LEGS are 24" inches, the part that holds the logs is smaller. The back LEGS are 20" and again the part that holds the logs is smaller. This grate is so small that the standard size logs I'm using keep falling off. Kind of scary since they're burning...
customer_reviews.author: nvrwake

customer_reviews.title: Form, fit, function.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, over built is the facts. Fit perfectly in an inserted fireplace. Heavy duty, holds all the wood I can fit in the space as (5) 8" logs. Glad I purchased and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett P.

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Have not had an opportunity to make a fire as of yet. Highly recommend cast iron for your fireplace. Long lasting, sturdy, and heats great! Just like cast iron pots.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Addition to any Firepit
customer_reviews.text: this was a very nice add to any outdoor firepit if you are looking for one. holds up very well.
customer_reviews.author: hogg02

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy grate
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased...very sturdy with very large solid bars...has stood up to some really hot hardwood fires...we do not burn fires all of the time but is well built...
customer_reviews.author: icnsltmfg

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: The grate seemed very sturdy and while not workable for me this seems like a good product
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Have had this is my fireplace for 2 years now and shows no sign of wear! Very sturdy piece and should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Sturdy and as indicated. Well into its use for the season already and very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Baracuda1956

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, well built product. We are very happy with this addition to our fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Studio DD

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace Grate is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in our fireplace and is very heavy duty. Shipped and arrived the next day after ordering . It’s working very well so far
customer_reviews.author: Don H

customer_reviews.title: This grate did not last very long.
customer_reviews.text: We had a total of 10 fires in our fireplace and it started bowing in the center. The grate needs a middle leg in the center like the previous one we had. Was really shocked that it gave in like that! Interesting to know if this happened with other buyers?
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy grate
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fireplace grate. It a little bit high @ 4” for my insert. I would prefer a grate that is 3” high.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is super heavy and very good quality! It fits perfect in my fireplace and really steps up the decor around my fireplace!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Will this grate last the whole wood burning season
customer_reviews.text: So, far this fire place grate has produced the best heat from all the previous grates purchased. The next test is to see how long it holds I up during this winter season?
customer_reviews.author: Tim McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Great grate!🤗
customer_reviews.text: Strong, attractive grate. Arrived promptly. Product even nicer than described. I would deal with this merchant again
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lynn Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Top quality Fireplace Grate
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace grate is simply the best built grate I have ever purchased and I have purchased 8 different kinds. The quality of the welds, the gauge of the iron and the powder coating are all equally impressive. I bought another for a replacement in the event I can’t find it again. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: christian h. irle

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty. This should last a very long time. If you need a heavy duty grate this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It was as represented. Packing could have been better as grate punctured thru the cardboard box it was shipped in causing a chip in the powder coat on one leg
customer_reviews.author: PLM

customer_reviews.title: Super durable!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and it's super sturdy! I haven't used it yet, but based on the quality I'm sure it will last long. I will try to update this rating in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This log grate is heavily constructed and hopefully will last many years
customer_reviews.author: jetmech

customer_reviews.title: This is a great grate. My only "problem" is that I wish ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grate. My only "problem" is that I wish I had ordered one size bigger, but this one will work just fine. It's not worth it to try and exchange it. Next time.......
customer_reviews.author: Dean L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Fits my fireplace great and is easy to wash off after fire season.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace grill needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: We like the fireplace grate but maker could easily improve by extending back part: tines / bars a little higher to keep burning wood from falling behind which is bothersome to me. Could easily be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Williams

customer_reviews.title: Strong, tough, durable
customer_reviews.text: Stronger, tougher, more durable than the one that came with my house new.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Lorain
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. Was nervous buying online but was perfect
customer_reviews.author: TABITHA LEITH

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty, High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, works well, should last for years. Its a little tall so the coals underneath don't do much for heating the wood unless its an all day fire.
customer_reviews.author: BLHJAT

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy grate which should last just about ever. It is quite heavy, which is of course a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: my old grate was 1/2-inch material and sagged in the middle after it got really hot. This one has not sagged after many uses where it has been heated to cherry red. Well-made product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Mueller

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed. Have only had one log fire with it so far, but seems great.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Startin

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, good value
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy, but arrived with some chips in the paint. Since fires are being set on it, not a big deal. Backing on grate is tall, so it provides good support in preventing the poker from hitting the back of the fire box
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Germann

customer_reviews.title: Grate is great
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I needed and fit perfect in the buck stove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Delivered as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The grate is very sturdy and functions as advertised. I was looking for a grate without a screen catch over the top of grate and this grate works perfectly. The height of the grate is good as well as allows for good airflow up under the burning firewood.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this grate
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of garbage, bought in November it melted and cracked 4 months later..biggest piece of junk I’ve ever purchased thru amazon
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality and very durable, fits my fireplace perfectly alot better than you can get at the big box stores. I have had several fires going with it and no problems, yes the coating burned off but that is to be expected if your going to use it.
customer_reviews.author: David french

customer_reviews.title: Durable and strong
customer_reviews.text: Our first great melted from the heat of the fire, but this one seems much more durable
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R. Pillsbury

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and nice finish though
customer_reviews.text: This grate is smaller than I thought it would be. Heavy and nice finish though.
customer_reviews.author: S. MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty and high quality. I can see this lasting a very long time. You get what you pay for! No cheap grate here.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Jones

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and good quality, perfect size for our fireplace! Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone W. Jr

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great. Delivery was on point. I did however screwed up. I should have ordered a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Reinaldo Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and attractive. We just began using it lastonth but love it. Holds a nice amount of wood and fits perfectly in our fireplace
customer_reviews.author: C. Valyo

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice grate. Heavy duty. We have a large fireplace and the grate holds a lot of wood
customer_reviews.author: CStroup

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and high enough for air flow
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy and heavy. High enought off the fire box floor for ventilation of the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Briggs

customer_reviews.title: works great so far
customer_reviews.text: I just used this a couple of times now. Fits my fireplace great. The logs are higher than my old grate. The old grate was 1/2 thick and was deforming from the heat. So far very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Levy

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: Just received it. Cleaned out my fireplace and placed it in for this coming winter. This thing is built like a tank. If I was going to weld up my own, it would be just like this. Can’t find this heavy duty grate at HD or Lowe’s. Would buy again but won’t have to for about twenty years.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Waldbillig

customer_reviews.title: licktey split shipping
customer_reviews.text: Appears heavy duty. Time will tell on the welds and coating. I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: parker wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Best product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: When they write heavy duty they meant extra heavy duty. Thick well constructed steel bars.
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: got this black wrought iron fireplace log grate as a piece of decor. Great product for the price, looks exactly as pictured and is nice and sturdy. This worked perfectly for my fireplace log set. Can't say how durable it would be for a real fire
customer_reviews.author: John Green

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit for my logs
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect in my fireplace. I love it and for the price was worth it
customer_reviews.author: Donna Arjona

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: the size fits my house perfectly. It is sturdy and made with good quality. It's almost winter and we finally got a nice rack to match the fireplace!
customer_reviews.author: Emily W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: quality is so great!!! can not believe it ,i was worried it before
customer_reviews.author: fiona

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made grate
customer_reviews.text: Perfect description of dimensions. Looking forward to utilizing it this coming winter. Our old grate gave up the ghost after 35+ years. This looks even more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent P. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great grate! Paint chipped off a little but then again it’s a grate! It’s a wear part. Very sturdy. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great for small fireplace. Gets the job done. Very durable
customer_reviews.author: Nicole kaemmerer

customer_reviews.title: The quality looks really good and it seems nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is a little smaller than I was expecting but I think it will still work. The quality looks really good and it seems nice and sturdy. I'm going to burn a fir e tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Morris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought this earlier in the season and have used it no more than 10-15 times and its already started to sag. If we didn't have bricks under it to block the ash dump, I would imagine it would be sagging even more.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: We have this grate at our vacation home that we use monthly. We’ve used this grate 4 times and it’s sagging in the center. Please recommend a grate that is far better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angi

customer_reviews.title: Well built to last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Need to do a better job packing one of the legs was sticking out of the box which in turn rubbed the paint off
customer_reviews.author: Smcm1984

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy gauge, appears very sturdy. Time will tell...quite pleased with product
customer_reviews.author: Konnoisseur

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Well built, super heavy duty. Good thick heat resistant paint.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: really heavy-duty and substantial. It is way better than anything I found locally at Lowe's or Home Depot. And, it was a good price/value. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kim
